main event: A civilian observed a round object with a bright light in the center moving up and down in the sky for 2 hours in Newport, Kentucky.
interesting points: The observation lasted for 2 hours,The object was described as round with a bright light at its center,The witnesses were uncertain whether they were observing an astronomical body, The report indicates that an inquiry was made to obtain more information,There are no photographs included in the documentation.
sighted object: a round object with a bright light in the center
